text.0: there are the dawn and night the grand and beauteous pair earth heaven and varuṇa mitra and aryaman.
text.1: indra i call the maruts mountains and the floods Ādityas heaven and earth the waters and the sky.
text.2: may dyaus and prthivi wise true to holy law keep us in safety from distress and injury.
text.3: let not malignant nirrti rule over us we crave today this gracious favour of the gods.
text.4: mother of mitra and of opulent varuṇa may aditi preserve us safe from all distress.
text.5: may we obtain the light of heaven without a foe we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.6: may ringing pressstones keep the rākṣasas afar ill dream and nirrti and each voracious fiend.
text.7: may the Ādityas and the maruts shelter us we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.8: full flow libations on our grass let indra sit bṛhaspati the singer laud with sāma hymns.
text.9: wise be our hearts imaginings that we may live we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.10: ye aśvins make our sacrifice ascend to heaven and animate the rite that it may send us bliss.
text.11: offered with holy oil with forwardspeeding rein we crave the gracious favour of the gods today.
text.12: hither i call the band of maruts swift to hear great purifying bringing bliss to he our friends.
text.13: may we increase our wealth to glorify our name we crave this graciousfavour of the gods today.
text.14: we bring the stay of life who makes the waters swell swifthearing friend of gods who waits on sacrifice.
text.15: may we control that power soma whose rays are bright we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.16: alive ourselves with living sons devoid of guilt may we win this with winners by fair means to win.
text.17: let the prayerhaters bear our sin to every side we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.18: hear us o ye who claim the worship of mankind and give us o ye gods the gift for which we pray.
text.19: victorious wisdom fame with heroes and with wealth we crave today this gracious favour of the gods.
text.20: we crave the gracious favour of the gods today great favour of great gods sublime and free from foes.
text.21: that we may gain rich treasure sprung from hero sons we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.22: in great enkindled agnis keeping and for bliss free from all sin before mitra and varuṇa.
text.23: may we share savitars best animating help we crave this gracious favour of the gods today.
text.24: all ye the gods whom savitar the father of truth and varuṇa and mitra govern.
text.25: give us prosperity with hero children and opulence in kine and various treasure.
text.26: savitar savitar from cast and westward savitar savitar from north and southward.
text.27: savitar send us perfect health and comfort savitar let our days of life be lengthened.
